name: Deer Hunter 2D
description:
Whether you are an avid hunter or just someone looking to explore your hunter and gatherer roots, Deer Hunter 2D is the perfect arcade-style shooting game for you! The game features simple controls for shooting and movement, as well as a format that is easy to learn and understand. Compete with your friends for the highest score in this action-packed bonanza!

The objective of each level is to achieve and/or surpass the target score by shooting as many deer as possible. Along the way, coins will randomly appear. Collecting these coins will allow you to purchase upgraded guns and ammunition that will enhance your game play and allow you to get further into the game. Make sure to use the Double Damage boosts that periodically appear throughout the levels to give yourself an advantage and increase your score!

However, beware the mighty forest, as mud puddles will often appear to slow your movement. In these situations, it is best to hope for a Double Speed boost: a blessing when accompanied with a mud puddle, and yet a curse that can throw off your timing under normal conditions!

Challenge your friends and see who can conquer the depths of the forest the best by downloading Deer Hunter 2D today!
